EmailTemplate.description: Reminder announcement to RSVP for 2017 DF 10K Inaugural Event
EmailTemplate.name: DF 2017 Save the Date Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE! Reminder to RSVP for Inaugural 10K Dreamforce Kick-off Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}{!CampaignMember.FirstName}!
We'd like to invite you to start your Dreamforce 2017 off with a bang at the inaugural 10K Dreamforce kick-off party. We are hosting an exclusive event that will include wine, cocktails, and appetizers as well as a very limited tasting of a number of rare bourbons from the 1950s to the 1990s that you won't want to miss! This event is limited to 10K clients and experts and will be a great opportunity to interact with 10K community members from around the world.
We will be mingling at a secret (for now) location in San Francisco on Monday, November 6 from 6:30 to 9:30 PM. We are trying our best to ensure we give all invitees an opportunity to taste from our selection of rare bourbons, so please let us know if you'll be able to attend so that we can accommodate accordingly. There will be more details to come as Dreamforce approaches.
RSVP for 10K Dreamforce Kick-off Party
Thank you for your continued support, and we hope to see you at Dreamforce!
The 10K Advisors Team
